pull.title: Backport to wx2.8 and dynamically link most libs.
pull.body:
Libs should never be statically linked unless there is a clear
reason, also, wx2.8 should have been used to begin with, a
development release should not be used for release software.

This is intended for 0.4.0, so that we can move towards proper bitcoin packaging in distro repos.
sipa has expressed some issues with performance that I have so far been unable to reproduce, maybe someone else can?

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.message:
Backport to wx2.8 and dynamically link most libs.

Libs should never be statically linked unless there is a clear
reason, also, wx2.8 should have been used to begin with, a
development release should not be used for release software.

events.body:
The "_" function for translation strings is standard.  This patch sure does stir a lot of code, as well as moving us away from that standard.

Seems like c pre-processor magic would be more appropriate than changing all that code.
I think search-and-replace was a nice function here
Yea, this needs to be done cleanly...or just move to qt.
